title: Reality Quest
summary:
Ha Do-wan is a bullied gamer, whose bullies force him to grind to obtain in-game items for them. 

After one such bully demands that Dowan obtain an impossibly rare item for him or be beaten in front of the prettiest girl in school, Dowan games day and night for a week until he drops dead from exhaustion. 

However, as soon as he dies, he respawns back in his classroom one week before his death. Everything is the same as it was before, except now he has all the skills he’s acquired from the games he’s played in real life! 

Will Dowan be able to use his newfound abilities and gamified existence to defeat his bullies?

title: Yamada-kun to Lv999 no Koi wo Suru
summary:
Recently dumped, Akane is just about to quit the game she used to play with her boyfriend when she meets Yamada in the same RPG. Yamada in real life turns out to be somewhat of a legend. The only problem is - he is ONLY interested in the game. As Akane's feelings grow, will Yamada's focus stay on the game?
___
The manga won the Tsutaya Comic Award in 2022.

title: Logging 10,000 Years into the Future (Apex Future Martial Arts)
summary: At the beginning of the martial dao, abnormal beasts invaded the world. Humanity’s martials had to retreat in defeat time and time again. Lu Sheng transmigrates to that time, but in his dreams he enters a world 10 000 years later. The foundational body refining method from 10k years in the future is several thousand times more effective than the current one. Then there’s the breathing method, body refining pill formula, and sacred martial law from 10k years later… Despite developing martial arts for 10k years, humanity was annihilated! Their martial arts civilization reached the apex, and yet there was no one left to inherit it. Except Lu Sheng, he’s exactly that last spark of hope!

title: I randomly have a new career every week
Evolution Begins With A Big Tree
Nano Machine
summary:
After being held in disdain and having his life put in danger, an orphan from the Demonic Cult, Cheon Yeo-Woon, has an unexpected visit from his descendant from the future who inserts a nano machine into Cheon Yeo-Woon's body, which drastically changes Cheon Yeo-Woon's life after its activation. The story of Cheon Yeo-Woon's journey of bypassing the Demonic Cult and rising to become the best martial artist has just begun.  

---

title: Lookism
summary:
Park Hyung-Seok is an unattractive loner who wakes up in a different body. Now tall, handsome, and cooler than ever in his new form, Hyung-Seok aims to achieve everything he couldn't before.

How far will he go to keep his body... and his secrets?

title: I Am Carrying Gold From The Post-Apocalyptic World
Spare Me, Great Lord!
summary:
In a world where extraordinary powers called *" Beneïsons "* govern everything; only a boy named Kleis was granted the gift of the *" Seint Graal "*, a power whose use he could not even understand.

Despite this, he did not lose heart and formed a party with his childhood friend Hinoka, who possessed the beneïson of the *" Seint de l'Espee "*, to carry out guild missions. However, due to a minor misunderstanding and betrayal, his mind and body were shattered.

At the same time, Kleis' beneïson revealed its true potential. The *" Seint Graal "* was the pinnacle of power, capable of granting any beneïson in existence to himself or others.

Having lost everything, yet now holding the power to gain everything, what will he choose? The end of the world or something else?

title: Keep A Low Profile, Sect Leader
Suicide Boy
summary: Lee Hoon is a 17 year old shut-in/highschool boy who wants to commit suicide, but can't decide on the method of his death so he wants to test all the various ideas he comes up with. Hooni is current living alone suicidally depressed over the debts left by his run away abusive drunk of a Father and the hospital bills racked up due to his now deceased Mother's illness, with very little savings he's also been unable to pay his rent for months, even at school he's bullied.

title: My Wife is a Demon Queen
summary:
Listen up folks! I’m living my life with the Demon Queen!  
  
A normal powerless male protagonist is entrusted to look after the fallen Demon Queen Isabella. Depleted of her powers, Isabella is forced to camouflage as a human and suppress her regal status. Evil masterminds plot to dethrone the powerful Demon Queen in a medieval fantasy land.
